content.rendered:
REDARC BMS LOAD DISCONNECT ISOLATOR

Redarc BMS Load Disconnect Isolator available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

The SBI12-BLD is used in conjunction with a REDARC Manager15 or Manager30 BMS to protect the auxiliary battery from excessive discharge. Specifically designed for use as the load disconnect solenoid controlled by the BMS, the black (earth wire) should be connected to the load pin of the BMS.

The BMS sets the turn on and turn off points through its settings and switches this black wire (earth when loads should be on, no earth when loads should be off), and there is additional voltage thresholds monitored by the Smart Start SBI12-BLD to ensure reliable solenoid engagement.

Voltage spike protection

The SBI12-BLD smart start battery isolator incorporates a number of spike protection components specifically designed to reduce the risk of damaging the unit, and is designed to prevent any spikes generated by the solenoid coil from affecting vehicle equipment.

Features

  • Overmould design
  • Compact in size and easy to install
  • Silver contacts for longer life and suitable for marine applications
  • Power saving technology
  • Fault indication
  • Fully surge protected
CLICK HERE to view the full range of products available for your 4×4!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!

excerpt.rendered: REDARC BMS LOAD DISCONNECT ISOLATOR AVAILABLE FOR ORDER THROUGH AUTOMAX 4X4!
